name: 1 minute run
description:
This is a cringe project made by inexperienced 13 year old dev in 3 to 4 days, So pls dont expect more from it lol, and also this projet is made for learning so I can make better games in future, btw have a nice day <3

Important!!!!!

Z to shoot Squares

X to shoot triangles

C to shoot Circles

COMING SUPPORT FOR WEBGL AS FAST AS POSSIBLE
